mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project ( proj_no, proj_user_id, proj_division, proj_title, proj_annostart, proj_annoend, proj_startdate, proj_enddate, proj_location, proj_detail, proj_viewcount) VALUES ( seq_project_proj_no.nextval, 'com02', #{projDivision:NUMERIC}, #{projTitle:VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{projAnnoEnd:DATE}, #{projStartDate:DATE}, #{projEndDate:DATE}, #{projLocation:VARCHAR}, #{projDetail:VARCHAR}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT proj_no, proj_user_id, proj_division, proj_title, proj_annostart, proj_annoend, proj_startdate, proj_enddate, proj_location, proj_detail, proj_viewcount, round((TO_DATE(concat(proj_enddate,'235959'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')- TO_DATE(proj_startdate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))) as proj_expectdate, round((TO_DATE(concat(proj_annoend,'235959'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')- TO_DATE(proj_annostart,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))) as proj_dday FROM project WHERE proj_no = #{value}
